abstract: The first of the Wal-Mart Express stores, scaled down from the chain’s typical superstore format, is to open next week in Gentry, Ark.
snippet: The first of the Wal-Mart Express stores, scaled down from the chain’s typical superstore format, is to open next week in Gentry, Ark.
lead_paragraph: GENTRY, Ark. — The neighborhood grocer could soon face some competition.

headline.main: Wal-Mart to Test Small Store Format
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart, Seeing a Niche, Introduces Small-Store Format
